text:
@RepAdamSchiff Back to Russian collusion again?

What do you all do, spin a big wheel of Trump with the following:

Racist 
Misogynist 
Nazi
Russian collusion 
Adderall addict
Covid-19 deaths
No Tax returns 

And whatever it lands on you accuse him of?

You're pathetic
